definition: to transform/to convert/to vary/to alternate/a transformation
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: Gray-matter maturity, however, does not signal the end of mental change.
sentences.chinese: 然而灰质的成熟并不标志着智力变换的终结。

sentences.english: The experimental data showed that the results were better than those determined by partial least squares.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，经小波变换后处理结果回收率明显提高。

sentences.english: The dual symmetry of Legendre transformation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 指出热力学关系具有勒让德变换的对偶对称性。

sentences.english: A new joint transform correlator for multi-object recognition is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种可用于多目标识别的联合变换相关器。

sentences.english: By changing the type of alkalising agent, it also became possible to adjust the colour of the cocoa powder.
sentences.chinese: 变换不同的碱剂，改变可可粉的颜色也就有了可能。

sentences.english: Change your learning methods when you hate studying.
sentences.chinese: 学厌了可变换一下学习方式或形式。

sentences.english: The theories of wavelet transform and multi-resolution analysis are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了小波变换和多分辨率分析理论。

sentences.english: Swiftly fly the years, one season following another . Laden with happiness and tear .
sentences.chinese: 日月如梭，季节变换，满载着欢乐和泪水。

sentences.english: Write a book, cross the ocean, take a new job, change your pace. ------ William James.
sentences.chinese: 写一本书，越过大洋，接受新工作，变换你的步调。

sentences.english: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 将局部几何变换平移指定尺寸。

sentences.english: The image processing apparatus performs color conversion processing on an input image.
sentences.chinese: 该图像处理装置对输入图像执行颜色变换处理。

sentences.english: Discrete Cosines Transform(DCT) is an effective tool for analysis image signal.
sentences.chinese: 离散余弦变换是分析图像信号的有效工具。

sentences.english: This quick-change artist is for you.
sentences.chinese: 这款能快速变换的背包正是你所需要的。

sentences.english: Basic composition of models is projective transformation from multi-dimensional allocation to bivariate distribution.
sentences.chinese: 模型的基本结构是一个从多维到低维的投影变换。

sentences.english: In this paper, a translation invariance wavelet transform is applied to image denoise.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要研究平移不变小波变换在图象降噪中的应用。

sentences.english: Application of wavelet transform in digital holography .
sentences.chinese: 小波变换在数字全息中的应用。

definition: to switch over/to switch modes or data streams/to cut (to a new scene)
to change (sth)/to alter (sth)/to change over (to sth else)
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
